name: Terra Defensio
description:
Earth is passing a meteor cluster, it's in danger of dying! Protect the planet for as long the possible, or in other words, delay the inevitable!

MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 50 (compo)

CONTROLS

WASD to move around

Click to shoot

Shift to toggle power up

CREDITS

Everything in the game was made by me, except the font.

SOFTWARE USED

Programming / Game design - Construct 3

Art - Aseprite

Music - Bandlab

SFX - Chiptone
